result.arabic_text: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱللَّهُ لَا تَتَّخِذُوٓاْ إِلَٰهَيۡنِ ٱثۡنَيۡنِۖ إِنَّمَا هُوَ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞ فَإِيَّٰيَ فَٱرۡهَبُونِ
result.translation: 51. Yalli isi naqoosak namma Yalla ma haysitinaay maqbudina, cagalah sin Yallay qibaada cakkisita usuk inki Yalla kinnik, toysa yoo inkittoysaay yoo uqbudaay yok meesita keenik iyye.
